001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.util.EnumMap;
004import java.util.Map;
005import java.util.Objects;
006import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
007import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock;
008import java.util.function.Supplier;
009
010import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEncoder.EncoderProvider;
011import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogOutput.OutputType;
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.format.StandardEventFormatter;
013
014/**
015 * Encoder registry
016 */
017public sealed interface LogEncoderRegistry extends EncoderProvider {
018
019        /**
020         * Registers an encoder by uri scheme.
021         * @param scheme encoder name.
022         * @param encoder loaded encoder
023         */
024        public void register(String scheme, EncoderProvider encoder);
025
026        /**
027         * Associates a default formatter with a specific output type
028         * @param outputType output type to use for finding best default formatter.
029         * @return formatter for output type.
030         */
031        public LogEncoder encoderForOutputType(OutputType outputType);
032
033        /**
034         * Sets a default formatter for a specific output type.
035         * @param outputType output type.
036         * @param formatter formatter.
037         */
038        public void setEncoderForOutputType(OutputType outputType, Supplier<? extends LogEncoder> formatter);
039
040}
041
042final class DefaultEncoderRegistry implements LogEncoderRegistry {
043
044        private final Map<String, EncoderProvider> providers = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
045
046        /**
047         * Creates encoder registry
048         * @return encoder registry
049         */
050        public static LogEncoderRegistry of() {
051                return new DefaultEncoderRegistry();
052        }
053
054        @Override
055        public LogProvider<LogEncoder> provide(LogProviderRef ref) {
056                var _ref = DefaultLogProviderRef.normalize(ref);
057                var uri = _ref.uri();
058                /*
059                 * TODO file bug with checker as it should have found scheme to be null.
060                 */
061                String scheme = uri.getScheme();
062                if (scheme == null) {
063                        throw new IllegalStateException("bug. uri was not normalized");
064                }
065
066                var provider = providers.get(scheme);
067                if (provider == null) {
068                        throw new LogProviderRef.NotFoundException("No encoder found. URI=" + uri);
069                }
070
071                return provider.provide(_ref);
072        }
073
074        @Override
075        public void register(String scheme, EncoderProvider encoder) {
076                /*
077                 * TODO maybe check if one is already registered and do something?
078                 */
079                providers.put(scheme, encoder);
080        }
081
082        private final ReentrantReadWriteLock lock = new ReentrantReadWriteLock();
083
084        private final EnumMap<OutputType, Supplier<? extends LogEncoder>> formatters = new EnumMap<>(OutputType.class);
085
086        /**
087         * Associates a default formatter with a specific output type
088         * @param outputType output type to use for finding best default formatter.
089         * @return encoder for output type.
090         */
091        @Override
092        public LogEncoder encoderForOutputType(OutputType outputType) {
093                lock.readLock().lock();
094                try {
095                        var formatter = formatters.get(outputType);
096                        if (formatter == null) {
097                                return LogEncoder.of(StandardEventFormatter.builder().build());
098                        }
099                        return Objects.requireNonNull(formatter.get());
100                }
101                finally {
102                        lock.readLock().unlock();
103                }
104        }
105
106        /**
107         * Sets a default formatter for a specific output type.
108         * @param outputType output type.
109         * @param formatter formatter.
110         */
111        @Override
112        public void setEncoderForOutputType(OutputType outputType, Supplier<? extends LogEncoder> formatter) {
113                lock.writeLock().lock();
114                try {
115                        formatters.put(outputType, formatter);
116                }
117                finally {
118                        lock.writeLock().unlock();
119                }
120        }
121
122}
